The original rapidminer.jar has been modified for use with GIFT. 
To restore rapidminer.jar to its original state, rebuild the jar
with a new MANIFEST.MF file using the text below the dashed line.
The new manifest file MUST end with a new line.
1/14/2015 - Ticket 1321

======================================================================
Manifest-Version: 1.0
Ant-Version: Apache Ant 1.8.0
Created-By: 1.7.0_17-b02 (Oracle Corporation)
Specification-Title: RapidMiner
Specification-Version: 5.3.013
Implementation-Title: RapidMiner
Implementation-Version: 5.3.013-WIN64
Implementation-Vendor: Rapid-I
Specification-Vendor: Rapid-I
Implementation-URL: http://www.rapidminer.com
Main-Class: com.rapidminer.gui.RapidMinerGUI
